explanations.mostly_agentic: Your posting contains more agentic (stereotypically masculine) than communal words. Studies show this appeals more to men and may discourage women from applying. It suggests agentic traits are primarily required.
explanations.mostly_communal: Your posting contains more communal (stereotypically feminine) than agentic words. This may encourage women to apply. Communal wording barely affects men's interest in applying.
explanations.empty: Your posting contains neither agentic nor communal gender-coded words. The language is gender-fair.
explanations.neutral: Your posting contains both agentic and communal words equally. The language is gender-fair.

error.detail: Failed to analyze the text. Please try refreshing the page, or contact us if the problem continues.
